FuncDef: This command configures the Destination-Host AVP that will be sent in CCR-I/U/T and RAA messages. If the destination host name is not explicitly set by configuration, it will be learned from CCA or RAR messages. In other words, the origin host name received in the CCA or RAR message will be used to populate or replace the destination host name for a session in SR OS node.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the destination host name, up to 80 characters.
